body_html: @jlebar Updated the PR per review comments. Please be cautious reviewing the static member function DeviceVersion::Parse as it would be used by bazel-generated header file cuda_config.h and I'm not very sure making its return type be StatusOr<DeviceVersion> a good idea.
body_text: @jlebar Updated the PR per review comments. Please be cautious reviewing the static member function DeviceVersion::Parse as it would be used by bazel-generated header file cuda_config.h and I'm not very sure making its return type be StatusOr<DeviceVersion> a good idea.
body: @jlebar Updated the PR per review comments. Please be cautious reviewing the static member function `DeviceVersion::Parse` as it would be used by bazel-generated header file `cuda_config.h` and I'm not very sure making its return type be `StatusOr<DeviceVersion>` a good idea.
